title: List of awards and nominations received by Ariana Grande
summary: American singer and actress Ariana Grande has won 175 awards throughout her career. Her debut album Yours Truly was released in 2013 and debuted at No. 1 on the US Billboard 200 chart.[1] The album spawned three singles "The Way", "Baby I" and "Right There", all which reached the Hot 100.[2] That same year, she won New Artist of the Year at the American Music Awards.
